text: Ohe yadera kitaba deya hayeche! Tomara imana ano tate ya amara nayila karechi tomadera kache ya ache tara satya- samarthanarupe, mukhapatradera bidhabasta karabara o tadera pechanera dike phiriye debara, athaba tadera bancita karabara purbe yemana amara dhikkara diyechilama sabbata anusaranakaridera. Ara allahâ€Œra hukuma abasya karyakara habe.
